name: نهلة Nahla
bio: Featuring a high neckline and billowing long sleeves with delicate gathered cuffs, this gown blends vintage charm with contemporary style. The belt cinches the waistline, while the tiered skirt flows gracefully, creating an ethereal, regal effect. Dress is double lined.

name: وردة Warda
bio: Tap into your feminine energy with our closed abaya kaftan style. Sleeves also include  subtle shimmer white bead work!

name: Dahlia داليا (Mint Blue)
bio: Elevate your evening wardrobe with this high neck abaya dress, adorned with floral crystal embellishments. Designed to make a statement, this abaya combines timeless sophistication with modern glamour. The intricate detailing along the neckline, cuffs, and matching detachable waist belt adds a touch of elegance, making it the perfect choice for formal events or special occasions.

name: غزالي Ghazali
bio: Look fabulous in this stunning black abaya which features oversized batwing style and glass bead handwork along the sleeves - perfect for making a splash on special occasions. For an extra touch of elegance, the abaya pairs perfectly with the matching plain headscarf!

name: Jannati جنتي (Green)
bio: Look fabulous in our head-turning silk abaya which features oversized, batwing style & split sleeves! The abaya includes silver glass bead handwork along the shoulders and back - perfect for making a splash on special occasions.

name: زهرة Zohra
bio: Look fabulous in this stunning black abaya embroidered with gold beadwork & jewels! - perfect for making a splash on special occasions. For an extra touch of elegance, the abaya pairs perfectly with the matching embroidered headscarf!

name: حبيبة Habiba
bio: A bold silk & satin blend abaya adorned with silver jewels and beadwork. Sleeves include a subtle split for extra character. This abaya is definitely a bold statement when entering any room with its airy cut. The perfect occasion abaya.

name: إيمان Iman
bio: A graceful abaya, detailed with intricate Afghan culture inspired glass mirror embroidery along perimeter of the abaya. The details include delicate floral motifs, accented with mirrors as well as fabric piping. The abaya's flowing fabric exudes elegance, while the detailed embroidery brings a sophisticated charm to the overall look. Perfect for formal or special occasions, the design strikes a balance between traditional modesty and contemporary style, making it a timeless wardrobe piece.

name: Hawa حَوَّاء (Black)
bio: Look fabulous in this stunning oversized batwing style abaya. Features include intricate silver bead handwork along the sleeves, an elegant slit at the bottom of the abaya, which is also embellished with beadwork, and the softest feathers to bring the whole look together - perfect for making a splash on special occasions.

name: Meera میرا (Silver)
bio: A closed abaya which showcases harmonious blend of intricate glass beadwork crafted into delicate floral motifs. The contrasting gems adds a touch of sophistication, elevating the design into a refined and feminine statement piece.

name: Sima سيما (Black)
bio: An abaya which showcases harmonious blend of black, adorned with intricate glass beadwork crafted into delicate vine leaf motifs. The contrasting net fabric adds a touch of sophistication, elevating the design into a refined and feminine statement piece. Side slits enhance the silhouette with graceful movement, making this abaya the perfect choice for special occasions.

name: أمينة Amina
bio: Look fabulous in our show stopper crepe abaya! Sleeves are a combination between a batwing cut style and normal straight cut to give a loose fit. Sleeves also include a subtle shimmered split sleeves! The bodice of abaya includes silver glass bead handwork across the middle of the abaya horizontally - perfect for making a splash on special occasions.

name: Khawlah خولة (Blue)
bio: Discover the incomparable elegance of the Khawlah open abaya, adorned with hand-crafted glass beadwork cascading along the dramatic split sleeves. Perfect for those special moments, this exquisite ensemble also includes a coordinating headscarf.

name: Amal أمال (Black/Silver)
bio: Discover the incomparable elegance of the Amal black open abaya, adorned with hand-crafted glass beadwork cascading along the sleeves. Perfect for those special moments, this exquisite ensemble also includes a plain headscarf.

name: Dahlia داليا (Black)
bio: Elevate your evening wardrobe with this high neck black abaya dress, adorned with floral crystal embellishments. Designed to make a statement, this abaya combines timeless sophistication with modern glamour. The intricate detailing along the neckline, cuffs, and matching detachable waist belt adds a touch of elegance, making it the perfect choice for formal events or special occasions.

name: Hoor حور (Black)
bio: Discover the incomparable elegance of the Hoor layered open abaya, adorned with hand-crafted glass beadwork, pearls & gems cascading along the sleeves and back.  Perfect for those special moments, this exquisite ensemble also includes a matching headscarf.

name: Aaira أرى (White)
bio: A graceful abaya, detailed with intricate Afghan culture inspired glass mirror embroidery along perimeter of the abaya. The details include delicate floral motifs, accented with mirrors as well as fabric piping. The abaya's flowing fabric exudes elegance, while the detailed embroidery brings a sophisticated charm to the overall look. Perfect for formal or special occasions, the design strikes a balance between traditional modesty and contemporary style, making it a timeless wardrobe piece.

name: نادرة Nadira
bio: Nadira cape abaya is designed to turn heads. Made from soft, flowing black crepe, it features a dramatic cape silhouette that moves beautifully with you. Each piece is hand-finished with sparkling crystals and fine silver strands that catch the light in the most graceful way.

name: Maysoon ميسون (Black)
bio: Indulge in timeless elegance with our Maysoon luxurious 3-piece abaya set, designed for the modern woman who appreciates fine craftsmanship and regal sophistication.

name: Printed Modal Hijab - Ocean Fog
bio: Feel the difference with Azelefa's signature modal – softer, smoother, and unmatched luxury. With its perfect weave and feather-light touch, it's a fabric you'll want to wear every day. Premium modal fabric for a luxurious soft touch. Flawless stitch and high-quality weave for a smooth, non-slip fit. Semi-sheer fabric in a single layer, fully opaque when doubled. Lightweight yet durable, perfect for all-day wear.

name: Sweatpants | Heather Grey
bio: Made from 100% French terry cotton, these straight-leg sweatpants combine comfort with a flattering fit. Featuring an adjustable waistband for a customizable fit, they offer a sleek, streamlined silhouette that’s both relaxed and flattering. Perfect for lounging or layering, these sweatpants provide all-day comfort without sacrificing style.

name: Sweatpants | Noir
bio: Made from 100% French terry cotton, these straight-leg sweatpants combine comfort with a flattering fit. Featuring an adjustable waistband for a customizable fit, they offer a sleek, streamlined silhouette that’s both relaxed and flattering. Perfect for lounging or layering, these sweatpants provide all-day comfort without sacrificing style.

name: Haya | Light Brown
bio: The Haya Abaya Dress is the epitome of everyday elegance and practicality. Designed with thoughtful details to suit your busy lifestyle, it offers a seamless blend of style and comfort. The customizable waist ties allow you to tailor the fit exactly how you like it—cinch them for a flattering silhouette or let them loose for a more relaxed feel. With snap clips on the cuffs, you can easily keep your sleeves secure, making it perfect for staying active without sacrificing style.

name: Haya | Navy Blue
bio: The Haya Abaya Dress is the epitome of everyday elegance and practicality. Designed with thoughtful details to suit your busy lifestyle, it offers a seamless blend of style and comfort. With snap clips on the cuffs, you can easily keep your sleeves secure, making it perfect for staying active without sacrificing style.

name: Madina | Pumpkin
bio: Introducing "Madina" - crafted from 100% breathable cotton for all-day comfort and elegance. This flattering design features delicate wooden bead accents at the cuffs, adding a subtle yet earthy touch. Perfect for any occasion, the Madina Dress combines effortless sophistication with a nod to nature, ensuring you look and feel your best.

name: Haya | Emerald
bio: The Haya Abaya Dress is the epitome of everyday elegance and practicality. Designed with thoughtful details to suit your busy lifestyle, it offers a seamless blend of style and comfort. name: Naadean Skirt | Espresso
bio: The Naadean Wool Blend Skirt combines timeless elegance with practical design. Crafted from a luxurious wool blend, this skirt features a flattering silhouette and seamlessly integrated pockets, adding functionality without compromising its sleek look.

name: Naadean Skirt | Cream
bio: The Naadean Wool Blend Skirt combines timeless elegance with practical design. Crafted from a luxurious wool blend, this skirt features a flattering silhouette and seamlessly integrated pockets, adding functionality without compromising its sleek look.

name: Ava Abaya | Chocolate
bio: The inner dress features a striking asymmetrical design in our soft vegan leather, providing a modern edge to your traditional wear. The outer abaya is adorned with vegan leather cuffs, adding a touch of chicness to this unique set.

name: Mariam | Autumn
bio: Introducing Mariam - crafted from our signature luxury chiffon for an ethereal, elegant look. Featuring the perfect fall color palette, this dress combines rich, warm tones with a flattering, structured silhouette that maintains a modest appeal. Its super flowy and fluid design creates graceful movement. An ideal choice for transitioning through the season in effortless style. Perfect for both day and evening occasions, the Mariam Dress brings together timeless sophistication and fall-inspired beauty

name: Celine | Navy & Beige
bio: Introducing "Celine" - a striking two-toned masterpiece in black and cream. Designed with a unique fabric-blocking technique, this dress perfectly balances structure with flow. The removable and customizable bows at the cuffs offer versatile styling options, allowing you to personalize your look with ease. Whether you're going for a polished or playful vibe, the Celine Dress adapts beautifully, making it a timeless addition to your wardrobe.

name: Brown Sugar Ombre Modal Hijab
bio: Sweet, smooth and timeless. Brown Sugar Ombre melts from a deep cocoa tone into soft warm brown, creating a natural gradient that flatters every skin tone. The bamboo modal gives it a cloud-soft feel, perfect for everyday wear, and the hair friendly texture keeps it in place while still looking effortlessly cute.

name: Olive Meadow Ombre Modal Hijab
bio: Sweet, smooth and timeless. Brown Sugar Ombre melts from a deep cocoa tone into soft warm brown, creating a natural gradient that flatters every skin tone. The bamboo modal gives it a cloud-soft feel, perfect for everyday wear, and the hair friendly texture keeps it in place while still looking effortlessly cute.

name: Two-Piece Cape Dress Navy
bio: This set includes a detachable shoulder shawl and a matching long-sleeved dress, designed to be worn together or styled separately for versatile winter looks. The light, stretchy knit fabric drapes beautifully over the body, offering a soft, flowy fit that moves with ease while keeping you warm.

name: Two-Piece Cape Dress Burgundy
bio: This set includes a detachable shoulder shawl and a matching long-sleeved dress, designed to be worn together or styled separately for versatile winter looks. bio: This set includes a detachable shoulder shawl and a matching long-sleeved dress, designed to be worn together or styled separately for versatile winter looks. The light, stretchy knit fabric drapes beautifully over the body, offering a soft, flowy fit that moves with ease while keeping you warm.

name: Mocha Brown Suede Dress
bio: Crafted from a soft stretch suede, this ankle-length maxi dress is both elegant and comfortable. The fabric holds its shape to create a structured silhouette and a beautiful hip outline, while still feeling smooth against the skin. Designed with refined details and a timeless cut, it’s a versatile piece that transitions effortlessly from day to evening. Pair with boots for a relaxed autumn look or heels for a polished finish.

bio: Crafted from a soft stretch suede, this ankle-length maxi dress is both elegant and comfortable. name: Fine Modal 'Tusk'
bio: Fine Modal is our premium woven fabric — lightweight, breathable, and refined. Delicately sheer and airy, our Fine Modal weave is designed for hot climates, offering cooling comfort and effortless drape. Intended to be worn loosely, this fabric pairs perfectly with our 360 Contour under-caps for fuss-free, secure hijab styling. Ideal for Hajj and Umrah, or any time you need lightness without compromise.

name: Chocolate Cotton Jersey Hijab
bio: Premium fabric with 4-way stretch for all-day comfort. Effortlessly drapes and holds in place without hassle. Provides full coverage without layering. High-quality fabric that won’t bobble or fade, even after multiple washes. Designed for effortless styling, this hijab is perfect for everyday wear, work, or evening occasions—simply throw it on and go!

bio: Premium fabric with 4-way stretch for all-day comfort. Effortlessly drapes and holds in place without hassle. Provides full coverage without layering. name: Mocha Bamboo Jersey Hijab
bio: Lightweight. Extremely soft & stretchy. Non-slip. Breathable – helps prevent hair damage. Moisture-wicking – stays fresh longer. Temperature regulating (cool in summer, warm in winter). 4-way stretch with a clean drape. Double-stitched edges that frame the face perfectly. Not prone to wrinkles.

name: Dark Brown Essential Top
bio: Gently oversized with a flattering, effortless drape. Pairs seamlessly with our Essential Trousers. Simple, refined, and thoughtfully made for everyday wear.

name: Black Essential Top
bio: Gently oversized with a flattering, effortless drape. Pairs seamlessly with our Essential Trousers. Simple, refined, and thoughtfully made for everyday wear.

name: Dark Brown Knit Rib Dress
bio: Long sleeve knit dress. V polo neckline. Flared bell style sleeve. Adjustable ties at side waist to cinch. Lettuce hemline. Designed for a relaxed, longline silhouette

name: Printed Sports Hijab - Smoke
bio: It's usually very hard to attribute cooling, lightweight & breathable to a sports hijab. But after 1 year of fabric research and reiteration, we have managed to achieve a sports hijab that has all the properties you need to have a comfortable workout, whilst letting you style your hijab like you normally would.

name: Printed Sports Hijab - Olive
bio: It's usually very hard to attribute cooling, lightweight & breathable to a sports hijab. But after 1 year of fabric research and reiteration, we have managed to achieve a sports hijab that has all the properties you need to have a comfortable workout, whilst letting you style your hijab like you normally would.

name: Essential Training Top - Pink
bio: This top was designed specifically to relieve you of these issues. The fabric used is very lightweight, breathable and sweat-wicking. Perfect for high-intensity activity. So you can go hard in the gym or on your run and still feel comfortable and cool.

name: Wide Leg Pant - Pink
bio: You need something loose but flattering, breathable but durable—something you can lift in, run errands in, and feel confident wearing anywhere.

name: Luxe Long Sleeve T-Shirt
bio: Crafted with butter-soft Modal fabric, thumbholes, back scoop and cinch detailing, this Lock-in long sleeve top offers unparalleled fit and comfort as you move. Experience full range of motion without readjusting or compromising on coverage in your new modest workout top.

name: Skirt Wrap Trouser
bio: Experience full coverage and style at its finest. Your New Favourite Wide Leg elevates expectations of modest activewear giving you the confidence you need to move freely in any setting. No more tugging down the shirt in between sets. Experience the freedom of intentional modest activewear design.

name: Mila Knit Co-ord Jumper
bio: A relaxed-fit knit designed for comfort and effortless style. Featuring a softly structured high neck, dropped shoulders, and deep rib detailing across the cuffs and hem. The front is finished with a subtle curved hemline for added shape and coverage. Style with the matching trousers for a refined, easygoing co-ord look.

name: Sofia Classic
bio: This is the ultimate in modest swimwear that will have you covered and photo-ready all summer long. Glide through the waters 4-way stretch material powered by patented Italian Ribelux™ exclusive to LYRA. You get 5 times more freedom of movement than polyester. Switch from poolside posing to lengthy laps in lightweight, fast-drying material perfected so you can focus on getting to your next adventure.

name: Sofia Pastel
bio: The classic, elevated. Everything you loved about the Signature collection with a pastel twist. Make waves with the ultimate in modest swimwear. Fuse form and function in this flattering silhouette that doesn’t compromise modesty. Glide through the waters in 4-way stretch material, powered by patented Italian Ribelux™ exclusive to LYRA. You get 5 times more freedom of movement than polyester. Switch from poolside posing to lengthy laps in lightweight, fast-drying material perfected so you can focus on getting to your next adventure.

name: Sofia Crop
bio: You said you needed the cropped cut so we made you the Crop. The short-sleeved swim-top and cropped leggings keep you modestly covered whilst allowing some of your skin to breathe. Customise your coverage throughout your day with the detachable scoop skirt and optional classic turban. Experience featherlight coverage and instant drying powered by patented Italian Ribelux™ 4-way stretch material exclusive to LYRA.

name: Sofia Shimmer
bio: Glisten by the water in the Signature Collection gets a romantic shimmer makeover. Wrap yourself in 11 stages of craftsmanship to experience the swimsuit that upgraded our expectations of modest swimwear. Fast-drying, patented Italian Ribelux™ material exclusive to LYRA, perfected so you can focus on enjoying your time in the water, no ballooning as you swim.

name: Soraya
bio: The all-new SORAYA - a refined evolution of modest swimwear, now featuring our first-ever built-in waterproof charm accessory, seamlessly integrated into the design. A subtle, gold-toned signature ring charm adds a distinctive, feminine accent — secure, sea-safe, and effortlessly chic. Crafted from LYRA’s exclusive Italian Ribelux™ fabric, SORAYA delivers 4-way stretch that adapts to every movement. It's 5x more flexible than standard polyester, offering lightweight, quick-dry comfort for all-day wear — from open-water swims to sunset walks.

name: Essential Top | Light Black
bio: This long sleeve, form-fitted top is perfect for everyday layering and a perfect wardrobe staple.

name: Satin Textured Scarf
bio: Elevate your look with our satin scarves — a lustrous outside and matte inside for the perfect grip. Available in multiple colors.

name: Emmie Shirt in Sandy Brown
bio: A classic button-down shirt that never loses its charm, offering effortless style and versatility from the office to evenings out. With a crisp collar, sleek buttons, and a perfectly tailored fit, it’s made to impress. Roll up the sleeves, do a casual tuck, or wear it loose.

name: Emmie Shirt in Checkered Leather
bio: A classic button-down shirt that never loses its charm, offering effortless style and versatility from the office to evenings out. With a crisp collar, sleek buttons, and a perfectly tailored fit, it’s made to impress. Roll up the sleeves, do a casual tuck, or wear it loose.

name: Eva Faux Leather Pant
bio: Step into sleek sophistication with these straight-leg faux leather pants, featuring bold diagonal side paneling for a striking, modern edge. Designed to elongate and flatter, these pants fuse structure with style, creating a look that’s as powerful as it is polished. Perfect for dressing up or adding a touch of luxe to casual outfits, they’re the ultimate statement piece.

name: Ginger Top in Beige
bio: Unleash your style with this fitted long-sleeve top, featuring thumbholes and a jewel neckline. The eye-catching asymmetrical ruching from the bust to the waist adds a playful twist, enhancing the silhouette with flair. Perfect for making a statement, this top effortlessly blends comfort and chic sophistication.

bio: Unleash your style with this fitted long-sleeve top, featuring thumbholes and a jewel neckline. name: Ellie Maxi 1.0
bio: Elevate your style with Ellie — modest, elegant, and perfect for summer events. Its florentine neckline and long sleeves with pleated sides add timeless grace, while the lightweight, breathable fabric ensures comfort for vacations or resort outings.

name: Oak Cargo Pant
bio: Oak Cargo — straight-legged Oak pant detailed with pockets on either sides to present a classy cargo-pant look. Made with a soft-to-touch, mildly stretchy, faux matte-suede fabric. Elevate your look with these versatile pants that are sure to become your go-to choice for every occasion.

name: Kira 1.0
bio: Discover the beauty of Kira — unleash your inner girly girl with this stunning faux-corset dress, featuring a feminine v neckline and delightful bubble sleeves adorned with faux button-down details. Perfect for picnics and summer outings, this lightweight and airy dress effortlessly combines elegance with comfort, capturing the essence of Miss FM style. Embrace your femininity and make a bold statement with this enchanting piece.

name: Demi
bio: If you love patterns and pattern blocking, this is the dress for you. As a signature feature of our dresses, this dress gives a slimming effect at the waistline with its quirky yet classy details. This dress does not come with a scarf.

name: Aya Knit Dress
bio: Aya — the essence of modest sophistication for the graceful woman. This elegant dress features a simple A line cut with an asymmetrical neckline, delicate ruffles on the hem, and thumb holes to keep sleeves in place, balancing style and modesty for today’s fashion-forward woman.

name: Jasmine in Black
bio: An eccentric elevation to your wardrobe. This lightweight dress features flattering slanted flat pleats and long cuffed bubble sleeves, providing stylish coverage for any occasion. The piece that beautifully fuses contemporary design with sophistication.

name: Black Knit Skirt Set
bio: A classic skirt and top duo that defines simplicity. With a sleek cut and classic neckline, this versatile ensemble is the perfect canvas for your creativity. Effortlessly pair it with knee-high boots for a polished look or dress it down with trendy sneakers for a casual vibe. A must-have for the everyday contemporary, fashion-forward woman.

name: Rahila Pleated Top - Black
bio: Soft pleated top with a breezy, flowy silhouette. Slightly oversized fit for effortless modest styling. Wide pleats that add texture without feeling bulky. Easy-to-style essential that pairs beautifully with skirts or trousers

name: Iqra Side Belt Dress - Mauve
bio: A flattering and versatile dress perfect for both office wear and casual outings. Features a chic side belt tie-up detail that cinches the waist, allowing for an adjustable and customized fit.

name: Iqra Side Belt Dress - Taupe
bio: A flattering and versatile dress perfect for both office wear and casual outings. Features a chic side belt tie-up detail that cinches the waist, allowing for an adjustable and customized fit.

name: Tailored Maxi Skirt - Coffee
bio: A simple cut skirt, tailored to perfection. Featuring a flowy and modest design with a hidden elastic waist. Crafted with a one of a kind waffle woven fabric for the perfect blend of structure and comfort.

name: Buttery Straight Leg Trousers - Bluebell
bio: Complete your look with our buttery-soft modal pants, designed for all-day comfort. These straight-leg pants feature a flexible elastic-back waistband and practical pockets for effortless wear. A versatile, polished essential that pairs perfectly with any outfit.

name: Tailored Vintage Cardigan - Navy
bio: A tailored cardigan inspired by timeless silhouettes. Includes a tie-back feature to adjust the waist, large statement buttons, and wide sleeves. Crafted with a one of a kind waffle woven fabric for the perfect blend of structure and comfort.

name: Tailored Vintage Cardigan - Coffee
bio: A tailored cardigan inspired by timeless silhouettes. Includes a tie-back feature to adjust the waist, large statement buttons, and wide sleeves. Crafted with a one of a kind waffle woven fabric for the perfect blend of structure and comfort.

name: Buttery Side Ruched Tunic - Bluebell
bio: Experience ultimate comfort in our buttery-soft modal tunic. This modest, tailored top features a ruched overlay, unique pretzel-shaped buttons, and wide sleeves for an effortlessly chic look. A versatile and cozy top that can be dressed up or down.

name: Draped Shawl Knit Top - Espresso
bio: Elevate your loungewear with this modest and soft jersey knit button-up featuring wide sleeves, an elastic back, and a front cape detail that drapes beautifully over the shoulder for extra warmth and coverage. Style it with the matching trousers, dress pants, or your favorite denim - the styling options are endless.

name: CityLite Track Jacket - Black
bio: A modest athleisure-inspired jacket designed with a flattering, adjustable silhouette. Featuring a drawstring waist, utility pockets, a large hoodie, and a two-way zipper for customization. Breathable, sleek, and effortlessly versatile—perfect for layering from studio to street.

name: Trench Coat Dress - Khaki Green
bio: Can’t decide between a trench coat or a modest dress? We’ve got the solution. Introducing our new Trench Coat Dress, perfect for this season and transitioning into the next. Featuring an adjustable waist and sleeves, wide cut lapels, functional pockets, and a mock (full coverage) slit for better movement.

name: Berry Print Modal Hijab
bio: Enhance your summer wardrobe with our Print Modal Hijab, designed specifically to complement our signature wrap dresses. Made from soft and comfortable modal fabric, it adds a fun pop of color to any casual or dressed up look. Perfect for summer.

name: Green Ocean Print Modal Hijab
bio: Enhance your summer wardrobe with our Print Modal Hijab, designed specifically to complement our signature wrap dresses. Made from soft and comfortable modal fabric, it adds a fun pop of color to any casual or dressed up look. Perfect for summer.

name: Brown Chiffon Knot Skirt
bio: This brown chiffon skirt features a double-lined design for enhanced comfort and modesty. Its lightweight fabric drapes elegantly, while the distinctive knot detail adds a refined focal point, elevating both casual and formal ensembles with a touch of sophistication.

name: Royal Blue Wrap Waist Dress
bio: Our signature Wrap Waist Dress is crafted for effortless styling and unmatched versatility. Designed with an attached wrap detail and wide sleeves, it offers comfort and a flattering fit suitable for any look. Easily dress it up or down to suit any occasion. Available in 10 colors, this dress is a perfectaddition to every wardrobe.

name: Orange Linen Dress
bio: Expertly crafted from a linen rayon blend, this Orange Linen Dress offers breathable comfort and an elegant drape. The long sleeves and v neckline complement the ruched waist detail on both sides, creating a flattering silhouette. Perfect for any occasion, this dress is both stylish and comfortable.

name: Wine Satin Tulip Dress (Pre-Order)
bio: Introducing our Beige Satin Tulip Dress, expertly crafted with a fully lined asymmetrical tulip skirt, hi low sleeves, and a round neckline. Made with luxurious satin fabric for a sophisticated and elegant look. Perfect for any special occasion.

name: Khaki Asymmetrical Pants Set (Pre-Order)
bio: This Khaki Asymmetrical Pants Set brings a sophisticated look to your wardrobe. The asymmetrical top, combined with the wide leg pants and the tie on the back, creates an elegant and modern ensemble.

name: Purple Cape Dress Set
bio: Effortlessly elevate your style with our elegant Cape Dress Set. This two-piece ensemble features a stunning flowy inner dress and a removable cape addition, allowing you to customize your look. Made with you in mind, this dress exudes sophistication and versatility. Perfect for any occasion, stand out this Eid.

name: Printed Tie Dye Hijabs
bio: Indulge in our latest collection of Printed Tie-Dye Hijabs. Crafted from a blend of soft cotton polyester, these versatile hijabs offer the perfect balance of comfort and durability. With 50 unique prints to choose from, you can effortlessly elevate your style for any occasion. Their lightweight design ensures all-day comfort, while the tie-dye pattern adds a touch of bohemian chic. To keep your hijab in place and prevent snags, simply use hijab magnets.

name: Jersey turban long scarf
bio: Jersey scarfs/hijab

name: Pashmina Shawls-Different Shades Available
bio: Elevate your style with our Pashmina Shawl Hijabs, crafted from elegant imitation cashmere. These versatile pieces, measuring 70cm x 180cm, effortlessly drape and flow, adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Available in a spectrum of enchanting shades, our Pashmina Shawl Hijabs offer the perfect blend of comfort, style, and modesty.

name: Watercolor Floral Printed Modal Hijab
bio: Wrap yourself in the tranquil beauty of our Watercolour Floral hijab. Like delicate blooms drifting across a shimmering pond, this hijab features a captivating blend of blues, pinks, and teals. Each piece is lovingly woven and made from our signature 100% modal collection, a renewable resource that offers a cooling touch as enchanting as its design. Experience the flowing artistry of watercolor in motion with this mesmerising hijab.

name: 2 Piece Crepe Abaya Set
bio: Discover our top-selling 2-Piece Crepe Abaya Set, designed for ultimate comfort and breathability. With a sleek detachable belt, this versatile set is perfect for all seasons. Embrace casual elegance with a slight stretch, while the broadcloth fabric consists of high-quality polyester. Enhance your wardrobe with this must-have item!

name: Deena Velvet Coat Abaya
bio: Embrace timeless elegance with the Deena Velvet Coat Abaya. This cosy and stylish piece is perfect for fall and winter, crafted from luxurious velvet for a touch of opulence. Available in four stunning colors and sizes S-XXL, this open-style abaya features convenient pockets for added functionality. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.

name: Effortless Everyday Sweatshirt Abaya Dress
bio: The Effortless Everyday Sweatshirt Abaya Dress is a versatile and comfortable piece designed for modern women. Crafted from breathable polyester, this long-sleeved abaya dress comes in 15 solid colors and is available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Its hoodie style adds a touch of casual elegance, while the side pockets offer convenient storage. Perfect for everyday wear, this abaya dress seamlessly blends comfort and style.

name: Classic Solid Color Abaya with Hijab Set (3pcs)
bio: Discover the luxurious comfort and style of our Classic Solid Color Abaya with a matching Hijab Set (3pcs). Made with breathable Jazz fabric, this set includes an inner sleeveless dress and an outer open Abaya, available in a range of sizes and colors including coffee, beige, gray, army green, navy, and black. Elevate your wardrobe with this versatile and elegant set today!

name: Essential Abaya Cardigan Knit Set
bio: Elevate your daily wardrobe with our stylish Open Abaya and Inner Dress Set. This versatile ensemble, perfect for Autumn, Winter, and Spring, combines comfort and elegance. The open abaya, crafted from a soft Wool and Polyester blend, features practical pockets and a contemporary design. The solid-color, sleeveless inner dress offers a minimalist look. Wear the set together for a complete outfit or purchase the cardigan and inner dress separately. Available in four classic colours (Coffee, Black, Khaki, and Apricot) and two sizes (S/M and L/XL), this set is the perfect addition to your modest wardrobe.

name: Suha hoodie abaya with pockets
bio: Experience ultimate comfort and style with our Suha hoodie abaya! Made from soft corduroy polyester material, this abaya features convenient side pockets, perfect for the chilly autumn/winter season. Available in sizes S-XL, this abaya is the perfect addition to your wardrobe.

name: Afraa Everyday Elegance Abaya Pant Co-ord
bio: Experience daily comfort and style with our Cotton Linen Abaya Pants Set. This set, made from a breathable linen feel blend provides a lightweight, airy feel ideal for spring, summer, and autumn. Designed for practicality, it features quick-dry, anti-shrink, anti-static, and anti-wrinkle properties, ensuring you look effortlessly put together all day long. The wide-leg pants include convenient pockets, adding functionality to this elegant ensemble."

name: Three piece beaded evening abaya
bio: This luxurious three-piece beaded evening abaya, crafted from acetate and polyester, is designed to make a statement. The intricate beading and beautiful hues of black and brown make it perfect for any evening event. Look elegant and sophisticated in this timeless, tailored design.
